1604065645_mirrored_kasv_github.body: I suffer from the same problem on my Ubuntu 16.04. I check your source code of the 'UpnpPunch.py',and I run your debug version of the 'UpnpPunch.py' above. According to the results and some informations I get from the Internet, I want to know whether it is necessary for my router to start the upnp mapping service,transporting the data got from Port 15443 to the Port 43110? Is it possible that I face this problem because of the lack of of the control over the router? If I got the control and start the upnp service manually and set the proper parameters, will I successfully install my zeronet? I am waiting for your answer,any words would be appreciated.

OK, it actually works today, though continuously telling me that

Thanks a lot. I love this project:).
